英文法規名稱: Standard for the Tolerance of Heavy Metals in Rice
中文法規名稱: 食米重金屬限量標準（93.03.05訂定）
沿革內容:
1.Promulgated on March 5, 2004
2.Amended on August 29, 2007

法規內容.條文內容: This Standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 17 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.
